1.title: New region: The Shadow Valley
1.description: Explore the new region with exclusive enemies and rewards. Challenge the new dungeon boss!

2.title: Class balance update
2.description: We have made adjustments to all classes to improve game balance. Check the details.

3.title: Christmas event: Gifts and surprises

classes.title: Choose your Destiny

darkWizard.name: Dark Wizard
darkWizard.description: The Dark Wizard is a master of elemental magic, capable of causing great damage at a distance. His main attribute is Energy, which increases his magical power. Although he has little defense, his ability to eliminate enemies quickly makes him a very popular class.

darkKnight.name: Dark Knight
darkKnight.description: The Dark Knight is a powerful warrior specialized in melee combat. His main attribute is Strength, which increases his physical damage. With high defense and hit points, it is ideal for players who prefer to be on the front line of battle.

fairyElf.name: Fairy Elf
fairyElf.description: The Fairy Elf is an agile archer with support skills. Her main attribute is Agility, which increases her accuracy and attack speed. She can attack at a distance and provide group support with healing and defense spells.

magicGladiator.name: Magic Gladiator
magicGladiator.description: The Magic Gladiator is a hybrid that masters both magic and weapons. He can use Dark Wizard and Dark Knight skills, making him very versatile. His attributes are balanced, allowing him to adapt to different combat situations.

darkLord.name: Dark Lord
darkLord.description: The Dark Lord is a field commander with powerful summons. His unique attribute is Command, which allows him to summon creatures and strengthen his allies. It is an ideal class for group play and leading battles.

summoner.name: Summoner
summoner.description: The Summoner is a summoner of magical creatures and spells. Her main attribute is Energy, which increases her magical power. She can summon creatures to fight for her and cast powerful control and damage spells.

rageFighter.name: Rage Fighter
rageFighter.description: The Rage Fighter is a fast fighter with devastating attacks. His main attributes are Strength and Vitality. Specialized in melee combat, he can perform combos of fast and powerful attacks.

classes.chooseClass: Choose from seven unique classes, each with their own skills and gameplay style.

registro.title: Account Registration
registro.subtitle: Join ETEREALCONQUEST and start your adventure
registro.usernameLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
registro.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
registro.passwordRequirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Access your ETEREALCONQUEST account
login.error: Incorrect username or password. Please try again.

recuperacion.title: Password Recovery
recuperacion.subtitle: Enter your email to recover your account
recuperacion.error: Error processing request. Please try again.
recuperacion.instructions: We'll send you a link to reset your password.
